00554 template <class T>
00555 void clamp(T& x,T min,T max){
00556     if( x > max )
00557     { x = max;}
00558     else if( x < min )
00559     {x = min;}
00560 }

00562 
00568 template <class T>
00569 T nextPowerof2(T v){
00570     int tmpv = static_cast<int>(v);
00571     tmpv--;
00572     tmpv |= tmpv >> 1;
00573     tmpv |= tmpv >> 2;
00574     tmpv |= tmpv >> 4;
00575     tmpv |= tmpv >> 8;
00576     tmpv |= tmpv >> 16;
00577     tmpv++;
00578     return tmpv;
00579 }
